Random_Position_Patch.wandb_logger module

class Random_Position_Patch.wandb_logger.WandbLogger(entity, run_mode, project_name, target_class, config)[source]

Bases: object

A simple wrapper for logging experiments to Weights & Biases. Supports logging of images, metrics (for example, ASR), and summary tables.

create_tables()[source]

Tables for structured logging

log_generator_evaluation(noise_i, epoch, asr)[source]

Log individual generator evaluation result.

log_patch_image(noise_i, epoch, patch)[source]

Log adversarial patch for a given epoch.

log_modified_image(patch_i, image_idx, modified_image, is_misclassified, target_model)[source]

Log modified image with adversarial patch (only during testing).

log_batch_metrics(epoch, loss, batch_asr, batch)[source]

Log batch-level metrics

log_epoch_metrics(loss, avg_asr, epoch)[source]

Log epoch-level metrics.

log_target_model_results(train_model_names, patch_i, target_model_name, misclassified, total, asr)[source]

Log test results on target models.

log_best_generator(generator_name, epoch, asr)[source]

Log best generator info for an iteration.

log_best_patch(noise_i, patch, testing=False)[source]

(Different from log_patch_image) Log the best-performing patch for each noise in a separate section, for better visualization.

finalize()[source]

Log final tables and finish the run.
